segments.text: ok , so what have you got in store for me tonight ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm really sorry , Ethan . I tried so hard , but I'm afraid I could't find a Dutch restaurant in town . The best I could do was a German one about 15 minutes from here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I though you said you wanted to have Dutch food ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh ! Ha-ha ! That's not what I mean when I said ' go Dutch ' !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Huh ? What were you talking about , then ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: ' going Dutch ' means to split the bill , silly !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: oath ... that makes so much more sense ! Ha-ha . Well , great , I don't like German food anyway !
segments.speaker: S2
